trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Fort Bragg
There were no other sightings in Fort Bragg on or around March 31st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a delivery for a restaurant I work for, and stopped at the customers house, who ordered the food. Upon getting ready to exit my vehicle, I observed an orange orb in the sky. It was cloudy that night, and no stars could be seen. I got out of my vehicle, and saw another orange orb light up in the sky. I called my customers' out to come and see. We all watched a total of 4 of these orange orbs in the sky. I returned to the restaurant, and was telling my co-workers about it. As I was telling one my co-workers, another orange orb appeared in approximately the same area as before. Both of us witnessed this orange orb. The objects were decending in a south westerly direction--glowing bright and fading out with no tail, moving rather slowly. This is not the first time I have witnesses these orange orbs. Myself and a group of approximately 8 other people witnessed them on New Years Eve 2013--just after midnight. I did some research and found they were seen all over the world that night. The objects on this occation were ascending in a north easterly direction. Pretty cool stuff. Peace :D
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: 5 Orange Orbs Seen Over Northern California Coast
